DESCRIPTION: #yFish are random Colorless cards that grant a small benefit, replace themselves, and Exhaust.
At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to your stacks of #yGlass #yArmor. Receiving unblocked attack damage removes all #yGlass #yArmor.
Take #b50% less damage from attacks. NL Reduced by #b1 when damaged or at the start of your turn
Create a creature to fight for you this battle.
A creature that deals 3 damage to a random enemy whenever you play an attack.
A creature that has a 50% chance to perform one of these two actions at the start of each turn. NL - Draws you a card. NL - Steals a card from you, returning it at the start of next turn.
